node.title: Episode 12- Eden Valley Institute
node.description: Eden Valley Institute in Loveland, Colorado, is a place of healing. For the team, their guests’ health—both spiritual and physical—is everything. They want to ensure that those who finish a lifestyle session go forth living life to the fullest. The personalized program includes consultations, exercise, hydrotherapy and massage, lectures, jacuzzi and sauna, as well as cooking demonstrations.
